content: These can be incredibly hard to dodge accurately, and is a good case for using the Pillar Stance to gain height off the floor and out of reach of the electric tadpoles.

These can be incredibly hard to dodge accurately, and is a good case for using the Pillar Stance to gain height off the floor and out of reach of the electric tadpoles.
